vcNum = 1 AND CASE WHEN blocked.blockedId IS NULL THEN 1 WHEN not regexp_like(v.userId, blocked.blockedId) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END = 1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, tb.* FROM ( SELECT v.vreplyNum, v.userId, userNickName, vNum, vrContent, v.vrRegdate, NVL(answerCount, 0) answerCount, NVL(likeCount, 0) likeCount, NVL(disLikeCount, 0) disLikeCount FROM vbbsReply v JOIN member m ON v.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT vrAnswer, COUNT(*) answerCount FROM vbbsReply WHERE vrAnswer!=0 GROUP BY vrAnswer ) a ON v.vreplyNum = a.vrAnswer LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT vreplyNum, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 1, 1)) likeCount, COUNT(DECODE(replyLike, 0, 1)) disLikeCount FROM vbbsReplyLike GROUP BY vreplyNum ) c on v.vreplyNum = c.vreplyNum WHERE vNum=#{vNum} AND v.vrAnswer=0 ORDER BY v.vreplyNum DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM <=#{end} ) WHERE rnum >=#{start}
